In England, in the seven days to 08 August, there were 170,895 new confirmed cases (302.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 August, there were 159,691 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% (11,204 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 August is 5,426,971 (9,596.7 cases per 100,000 population).
